me.iffa.bananaspace.api
Class SpaceConfigHandler

java.lang.Object
  me.iffa.bananaspace.api.SpaceConfigHandler

public class SpaceConfigHandler
extends Object

Static methods to use internally (and externally, why not?) to handle world-specific configuration.

Author:
iffa
